title: TMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Technician Radio Diagnosis Post
description: The Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Technician Radio Diagnosis Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc, B.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, educational details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are looking f...
